87147.<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n0:
The Peace Incense I need you to fetch is going to be dropped by <%sev_que_name0> in Lyana Desolate
Area.

57479.<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia, I have a visitor. Can't you
even knock?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57480.<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I heard from my mom. She said she was
going to hold a meeting for the people
of the town.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87175.<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Why don't you go and offer one of your
flowers to your sister's tombola?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57481.<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You've made excuses like being busy,
and you haven't gone to your sister's
tomb yet.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57482.<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>As mayor, I have a job to do. Don't
let a child put his mouth on every
adult's business.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57484.<voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>You're interrupting my conversation.
Now, get out.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57485.<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I have shown you how I am not at all
easy to look at. I've become quite
cocky recently.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57486.<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Come on, we don't have much time
before the meeting. I've asked you to
get Peace Incense for me.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57487.<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n0:
The adults in town are scared silly, thinking that the ghosts of children are holding a grudge against them.
Come on, read your sister's diary.

57489.……今まで 大人に反抗してきた 私たちだけど\n自力で 生活するようになってから:
We used to rebel against adults, but
since we started living on our own,
we've come to appreciate them more.

57490.今は みんなで 毎日 ダーマ神殿に行って\n大人たちが 早く帰ってくるように\n:
Now we all go to Alltrades Abbey every
day to pray for the adults to come
home early.

57491.もしかしたら 大人たちとは\nもう 二度と会えないのかもしれないけど\n祈りつづ:
Maybe we will never see the adults
again, but if we keep praying, one day
we will.

57492.<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n0:
They don't hold a grudge against anyone. They pray quietly at Alltrades Abbey every day, waiting for the
adults to return.

57493.<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The adults in town have stopped going
to prayer altogether, and this is just
not the way things are supposed to be.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57494.<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n0:
Oh, you brought Peace Incense. I'm glad to hear you made it in time for the meeting. Would you be so kind as
to give it to him immediately?

57495.<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Oh, what's wrong? We can't start the
meeting without the Peace Incense.
Now, will you hand it over, please?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57496.<pc>は ブラト町長に\n安らぎの香を 渡した。:
<pc> gave Mayor Burat the
Peace Incense.

57497.<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>No, thank you very much. We have a
special guest this time, and I am sure
this gathering will go well.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57498.<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>You'll hear some very interesting and
informative talks, and we hope you'll
join us.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57499.町中の 大人たちが\n集会所に 集まってきた。:
Adults from all over town gathered in
the assembly hall.

57500.<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Ladies and gentlemen, thank you very
much for coming to this unexpected
meeting today.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57501.<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>After the accident at that old Church,
this town became deeply saddened and
scared of ghostly figures. So...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57502.<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Today, I am here to relieve you of
your worries and distresses.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57503.<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I am Sadak, a traveling medium who has
come to save this town from being
terrorized by evil spirits.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57504.<voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>You call our child an evil spirit?<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57505.<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n0:
Yes, they are evil spirits. The souls of those who die holding grudges become evil spirits and curse the
living.

57506.<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n0:
First, let's cleanse this assembly hall by mixing the holy ashes I prepared with Peace Incense and takita
to prevent evil spirits from entering.

57507.<voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>Oh? Nice aroma.<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57508.<voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>Oh, it's kind of comforting.<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57509.<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Now, think back carefully to when your
child was alive.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57510.<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Was there anything that triggered a
resentment in them? Did you ever hit
your children hard?<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57511.<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>I always imposed a strict curfew and
didn't let them play much.<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57512.<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>I was always lecturing him about
studying, so maybe that's what pushed
him over the edge.<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57513.<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n0:
I see. The children of the town, driven by strict discipline, began to dislike adults and to play in the old
Church.

57514.<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n0:
And then you lost your life in a gasket collapse, and now you wander around as an evil spirit, harboring a
grudge against this world.

57515.<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n0:
If this continues, you will continue to be cursed by evil spirits, and eventually they will take you with
them.

57516.<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>But don't worry. I will protect you
from now on so that you will not be
frightened by evil spirits!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57517.<voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You're a liar.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57518.<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>They have nothing against adults. You
can see that in this journal.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57519.<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>This is my sister's belongings. It's a
special journal that connects this
world to the next.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57520.<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n0:
If you read inside, you'll find out about the afterlife. The children who died in the Church accident don't even
know they're dead.

57521.<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n0:
In a world of death where there are only children, we keep waiting for the adults who have disappeared to come
back to us!

57522.<voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia! Are you trying to defy me
again?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57523.<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n0:
You have gone to the trouble of imitating Lieselotte's writing, and you have created a very elaborate
story. Don't let a child's fantasies drive a grown man around.

57524.<voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>It's not a fantasy.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57525.<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Get the hell out of here! Don't ever
bother me again!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57526.<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>My daughter was so rude. I'm sorry for
interrupting such an important
meeting.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57527.<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>No, no, no, don't worry about it.
Let's adjourn for now and continue the
meeting at a later date.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57528.<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n0:
Now that I've accomplished what I set out to do, I'll leave you to it for today. Please leave the matter of evil
spirits to me.

57530.<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n0:
I am sorry that the event ended like this, even though you went to the trouble of helping me with the
preparations.

57531.<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n0:
As Sadak said, thanks to Peace Incense, everyone was relaxed and listening to what I had to say until
about halfway through.

57532.<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n0:
We hope you will not be disappointed and will join us again at the next meeting. This is our way of saying
thank you.

57533.<voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Now, if you'll excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000069.<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm worried about you, Lucolia. I
didn't lie to her!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000070.<voice 04338_29000070><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04338_29000070><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>That's right. We should at least say
we believe in you.<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
